title: Trauma Patient

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Remember who you were at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only remember the role of a dead Town member.

- You cannot become a unique or Town Killing role.

- You may attempt to remember the role of a cleaned player. However, if they are a role that you cannot become, your ability will fail.

desc:
Post 489
*Ah, yes...I remember. I used to be The Entire Fucking Town.*
